Health and Safety (HS) User's Guide

Health and Safety Configuration Parameters

Health and Safety Commands Health and Safety Telemetry Health and Safety Table Definitions

The following are configuration parameters used to configure the Health and Safety Application either for each platform or for a mission as a whole.

Global HS_ALIVENESS_DEFAULT_STATE
Default State of the Aliveness Indicator

Global HS_AMT_FILENAME
Application Monitor Table (AMT) filename

Global HS_APP_NAME
Application Name

Global HS_APPMON_DEFAULT_STATE
Default State of the Application Monitor

Global HS_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH
Software bus command pipe depth

Global HS_CPU_ALIVE_PERIOD
CPU aliveness output period

Global HS_CPU_ALIVE_STRING
CPU aliveness output string

Global HS_CPUHOG_DEFAULT_STATE
Default State of the CPU Hogging Indicator

Global HS_EMT_FILENAME
Event Monitor Table (EMT) filename

Global HS_EVENT_PIPE_DEPTH
Software bus event pipe depth

Global HS_EVENTMON_DEFAULT_STATE
Default State of the Event Monitor

Global HS_IDLE_TASK_NAME
Idle Task Configuration Parameters (custom)

Global HS_IDLE_TASK_PRIORITY
Idle Task Priority (custom)

Global HS_MAT_FILENAME
Message Actions Table (MAT) filename

Global HS_MAX_CRITICAL_APPS
Maximum number of critical applications

Global HS_MAX_CRITICAL_EVENTS
Maximum number of critical events

Global HS_MAX_EXEC_CNT_SLOTS
Maximum reported execution counters

Global HS_MAX_MSG_ACT_SIZE
Maximum message action size (in bytes)

Global HS_MAX_MSG_ACT_TYPES
Maximum message action types

Global HS_MAX_RESTART_ACTIONS
Max Number of Processor Resets that may be performed by HS

Global HS_MISSION_REV
Mission specific version number for HS application

Global HS_POST_PROCESSING_DELAY
Time to wait after performing processing (in milliseconds)

Global HS_RESET_TASK_DELAY
Time to wait before a processor reset (in milliseconds)

Global HS_STARTUP_SYNC_TIMEOUT
Time to wait for all apps to be started (in milliseconds)

Global HS_UTIL_AVERAGE_NUM_INTERVAL
CPU Average Utilization Number of Intervals

Global HS_UTIL_CALLS_PER_MARK
CPU Utilization Calls per Mark (custom)

Global HS_UTIL_CONV_DIV
CPU Utilization Conversion Factor Division (custom)

Global HS_UTIL_CONV_MULT1
CPU Utilization Conversion Factor Multiplication 1 (custom)

Global HS_UTIL_CONV_MULT2
CPU Utilization Conversion Factor Multiplication 2 (custom)

Global HS_UTIL_CYCLES_PER_INTERVAL
CPU Utilization Cycles per Interval (custom)

Global HS_UTIL_DIAG_MASK
CPU Utilization Diagnostics Mask (custom)

Global HS_UTIL_HOGGING_TIMEOUT
CPU Utilization Hogging Timeout

Global HS_UTIL_PEAK_NUM_INTERVAL
CPU Peak Utilization Number of Intervals

Global HS_UTIL_PER_INTERVAL_HOGGING
CPU Utilization Hogging Utils Per Interval

Global HS_UTIL_PER_INTERVAL_TOTAL
CPU Utilization Total Utils Per Interval

Global HS_UTIL_TIME_DIAG_ARRAY_POWER
CPU Utilization Diagnostics Array Configuration (custom)

Global HS_WAKEUP_PIPE_DEPTH
Software bus wakeup pipe depth

Global HS_WAKEUP_TIMEOUT
Wakeup Message Software Bus Timeout

Global HS_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT_VALUE
Watchdog Timeout Value

Global HS_XCT_FILENAME
Execution Counter Table (XCT) filename

Generated on Tue Mar 3 12:58:37 2015 for CFS Health and Safety (HS) Application on User's Guide by  1.4.7
